entries.text: #0Talk-1st time
Hello there. Travelling all alone in these treacherous times?
Well, I hope you have a very good reason.
Oh, hogwash, who am I to judge? Hah...
My name is Pate.
I journey hither and thither... On a sort of... ...treasure hunt, you might call it.
Be careful out there. There's talk of unsavoury bandits who prey upon travellers like yourself.
#0Talk-2nd time
Oh yes, you be cautious if you go any farther.
There's treasure in there, for certain, but the entrance locks from behind.
I saw the same design earlier, and it's the same contraption, I'm sure.
I was with this warrior, you see, and he insisted that he go inside first.
The rather brusque fellow tried to swipe the loot for himself, but it trapped him inside.
I still have the gent's ring. I do hope he wasn't harmed.
#0Talk-3rd time
I'll leave this one to you. I'm worried about what might be inside.
#0Talk-1st time after the gate trap has been activated
Well, I see you managed to escape.
I hope that brave warrior didn't come a cropper either.
Be careful out there. There's talk of unsavoury bandits who prey upon travellers like yourself.
#0Talk-1st time after the gate trap has been activated, before talking to him
Well, that was a close call! Heh heh...
I wanted to warn you of the trap down the way, but you walked right past me.
My name is Pate.
I journey hither and thither... On a sort of... ...treasure hunt, you might call it.
Be careful out there. There's talk of unsavoury bandits who prey upon travellers like yourself.
#0Talk-2nd time after the gate trap has been activated
Oh, but you should take this.
It allows Undead to call out for help to one another, across the fissures between worlds.
With luck, somebody will lend you a hand.
#0Talk-3rd time after the gate trap has been activated
Good to see you safe.
#0Talk-Summoning as White Phantom successfully defeating The Last Giant
We went through a lot together. Take these, as a token of our friendship.
Don't be shy, they were meant for you... Heh heh...
#0Talk-1st time
Well, we meet again.
There's treasure this way... But I've a bad feeling about it.
I don't quite have the guts myself! Hah hah...
#0Talk-1st time after acquiring the Great Heavy Soul Arrow scorcery
Well, good to see that you survived.
Perhaps you're more rugged than I thought.
In any case, the treasure is yours. Since you went ahead, and took the leap.
#0Talk-2nd time after acquiring the Great Heavy Soul Arrow scorcery
I prefer a more cautious approach. It's hard to know who to even trust these days.
For instance, I've heard that a man is out for my life.
Now, what misunderstanding could have ever led to that?
The poor bloke must have quite an imagination. Heh...
#0Talk-3rd time after acquiring the Great Heavy Soul Arrow scorcery
You be careful, too, my friend. For trust can be a dangerous thing.
#0Talk-After approaching him & Creighton while they are fighting
He swung at me! Please, lend me a hand!
#0Talk-Without having assisting him in killing Creighton
What was he thinking?
I haven't done a thing.
#0Talk-1st time after assisting him in killing Creighton
What misunderstanding could have caused this?
Well. Thank you. I owe you my life.
My little pied-à-terre lies beyond here.
You'll find some of my treasures there. Help yourself to those that suit you.
Here, use this key.
#0Talk-2nd time after assisting him in killing Creighton
Be cautious on your travels.
#0After opening the trapped chest
Ooh, that'll leave a nice scar!
#0Upon being attacked-1st time
Eek!
#0Upon being attacked-2nd time
What the devil's...!
#0Upon being attacked-3rd time
Now, stop that!
#0Upon being attacked & made hostile
Oh, I can scrimmage, my friend.
#0Upon approaching him, after he has previously killed the protagonist
You again? Oh, heavens...
#0Upon killing the protagonist
Heh heh heh...
#0After reducing his health to 50% or lower
Not too shabby... Heh heh...
#0Upon dying
Aiieeegh!
##There's a right foul creature lurking this way. I'd say, why disturb the thing?
##But if you must go on, I'm not one to stop you.
##I wish I were more help myself, but I haven't much bravery in me. Heh heh...
##Heh heh heh...
##Hey. You haven't lost your mind yet hugh?
##I'm Pait. Since we're both sane, why don't we get along?
##Oh, it's you. Long time no see.
##Oh, yes. Here, I'll tell you a secret. There seem to be a treasure hidden over there.
##Of course I want it for my own, but I smell something uneasy.
##You know? I'm a weak timid man. If there's a strong hollow, I will be dead before I even wet my pants.
##I know you're strong, so you can handle any hollows, right? So this time, I'll give you the chance.
##Come on, If there is something awful, run back here. I'm a man. In that case, I will help you.
##What are you waiting for? Come on, I'm giving you the treasure. Now go.
##Oh…. It's you. What's the matter? You surly look stern.
##I accidently touched that device. Did..did it cause you any trouble?
##No, it wasn't on purpose! Of course not!
##In fact, you're here just ok. It wasn't a big deal right?
##Here take this as an apology. It's such an harsh world, we should help each other, don't you think?
##Come on don't give me that face now. We're friends, right?
##Huh? Hey, is that the treasure you have there!?
##W…Well, that's nice! Ha ha ha.
##What? You already got the treasure, what more are you looking for?
##Now go already.
##What? Ouch!
##Hey! Stop that!
##Stop it!
##P…Please, calm down!
##All right, all right, if that is what you want!
##I have no other choice! God, how unlucky can I be!
##Shit, just die already!
##Shit, how can it be?
##Huh, well that was close.
